website_summaries.verdict: Choose this transparent bag if you have a lot of makeup to organize and need to locate each product with ease.
pros: Stands out for its clear vinyl material that allows easy identification of products for quick access
Has numerous compartments and a convenient shoulder strap, making it ideal for travel
cons: The material is on the stiff side, which may make some of the snaps difficult to close at first

customer_reviews.title: MY FAVORITE PURCHASE ON THIS WEBSITE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this bag! I fit the contents of 4 large and overflowing makeup bags and a plastic container of makeup inside this bag and still have a empty outside pocket and the middle is completely empty! I have plenty of room to add my hair products if I wish as well. Everything I could of asked for. RECOMMEND 100%!
customer_reviews.author: Kesha

customer_reviews.title: A year later and I still love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag- it currently holds my entire makeup collection and a year after purchasing it has held up amazingly! I love the side zippered pocket that is perfect for shampoo when I'm traveling or my makeup brushes at home It keeps my collection contained and not spread across the house. Extremely easy to travel with- when I travel it holds my blow dryer, flat iron, shampoo, conditioner, skin care regimen, hair brush, blow drying round brush, and my daily makeup. It's large and perfect for what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: I rarely write reviews but I love this bag so much that I had to
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write reviews but I love this bag so much that I had to. As a freelance makeup artist I'm constantly needing basic things while working, and sifting through bags looking for specific items is a hassle. This bag solves that problem. I found everything I needed in seconds while working on set, and there's so much space. FYI for those who are planning to buy this bag, since it's plastic it comes flat and is hard to shape into place. Use a blow dyer on the lowest setting of heat and mold it into place. Took me about 15mins to do this.
customer_reviews.author: loretta youngsilks

customer_reviews.title: Best tote bag ever!
customer_reviews.text: Second purchase for this bag. First one is still going strong. I use them for going to craft evenings and its fabulous to see everything. The plastic is extremely well made. Snaps are great quality, zipper is smooth. . The seams are well made, and the handle is comfortable and sturdy. I like the option of the handles or the large strap. I stuff this bag to the seams and cant imagine it ripping. Its a thick plastic. I can see tons of uses for this bagBest tote bag ever, ever, ever.
customer_reviews.author: A. Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Good bag but needs double zipperheads
customer_reviews.text: This bag is sturdily constructed and does not generate static electricity. My one criticism is the lack of double zipperheads on the main compartment zipper. Double zipperheads are needed in a bag such as this - which is large and intended for for constant use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps me organized
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my nail products and supplies. I love the fact I can see through it. I can find what Im looking for at a glance. All of the pockets keep me organized even when Im rushing. You cant see it from the pictures but there is a zippered pocket inside which is perfect for my tiny easy to fall to the bottom things. I bought really cute flowered pouch to keep my brushes in. They are a unbeatable pair I get compliments all the time.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: This is an ALMOST perfect bag!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bag ... the materials and workmanship are top notch! I really like that I can organize so many smaller items in the outside pockets. Also, there are 2 full-length pockets inside, one with a zipper! The ONLY con to this bag is having an end pocket only on one end of the bag. Not only does it look odd, but it also weighs one end of the bag down more than the other, so that carrying is off balance. And it is the only extended-height exterior pocket. I will have to change a few things around so that the contents of that pocket are lighter. Other than this one con, it's the perfect bag!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Denis

customer_reviews.title: Legit
customer_reviews.text: It’s not duffel bag sized. It’s large purse sized. But it’s gonna do the job
customer_reviews.author: GamerNurseEyeshadowQueen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: The bag is spacious, holds Everything! Easy to clean, seems durable. I knocked off 2 stars because when I opened it, it was missing a button on the large side pocket. When I purchase a product brand new, I expect it to have all of its parts so that was a bummer. I can fix the button by going to Michael's but it's not that urgent. Also, the buttons are magnetic but not strong magnets, rather weak. I think for $30 it should have stronger buttons. Overall, it seems like it will do the job and if it gets dirty which of course it will, it's easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for sewing, mending, embroidery and small projects. Lots of room, lots of pockets in various sizes. The only thing wrong with this bag is probably the strength of it. It is stiffer than I thought it would be. However I can see where making it softer would make it weaker. I keep it stocked and next to the couch lol
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Clement

customer_reviews.title: Durable and roomy
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute bag. It has a nice amount of pockets and the plastic is thick and looks durable. It zips nice and smooth. I thought it would have been bigger since I put in “large cosmetic bag” but I like the bag so much I think I will just buy another. (It might work for the average person like my mother but I have a lot of makeup) I definitely would recommend this bag to anyone! Nice purchase and nice price. Love it!!! Oh and the plastic did not have a smell to it!!
customer_reviews.author: Mama

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I received my bag in only a few days, spacious, sturdy and lightweight. As previously stated no separating compartment inside the bag, but not a deal breaker for me since the bag is see through. I can now fit all of my cosmetics and toiletries into one bag. One suggestion would be to have a removable strap. I plan to cut mine off since I will be packing the bag in my luggage and not carrying my personables through the airport, just a personal preference. I need the bag for extended trips only.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Love it and highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this makeup bag!! My last one ripped so I was looking for a very durable one and this was better than I could have expected, great quality and also has so much room and pockets!! I love pockets and this bag is full of them!! I definitely recommend if you have a lot of makeup that you travel with alot!
customer_reviews.author: Nina Noneya

customer_reviews.title: Five stars
customer_reviews.text: This bag is the perfect size to fit essential products on the go. It's made of a heavy duty industrial plastic and the main compartment zipper is industrial material as well. It is not a double zipper, but that's okay. Very durable and useful for set work and the weight is evenly distributed once all my products are stored within the bag. This bag is bigger than I expected! Perfect for a makeup artist and hairstylist working on set. Oh and I received my bag in the mail very quickly! A must have !
customer_reviews.author: kina

customer_reviews.title: Cosmetic bag is great for art supplies
customer_reviews.text: After much searching, and trying various containers, I love this bag--not for cosmetics--but for watercolor painting supplies. I can easily see where I have tucked various supplies without digging through canvas bags, etc. The side pocket is large enough to place folded tracing and transfer paper when traveling to workshops and painting classes. Also, it is terrific for outdoor painting, because I can carry it easily over my shoulder or by the handles. It is lightweight and strong. A very worthwhile purchase--I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Nan

customer_reviews.title: Bag is very useful, but it was missing the strap.
customer_reviews.text: The bag was missing the strap. My daughter was very disappointed that it was missing. I would appreciate it if you could send it to me. Other than the missing strap, my daughter has been pleased with the bag. Thank you, Brian Wilkerson
customer_reviews.author: Brian Wilkerson

customer_reviews.title: it's not a stiff plastic like the ones at Target or Walmart
customer_reviews.text: Shany is the way to go. it's not a stiff plastic like the ones at Target or Walmart. Very durable and I like the handle. I know that sounds weird but I pack mine pretty full and the handles are hard plastic wrap makes it easy to carry. I've put this thing through the ringer and all the snaps and buttons are still holding strong. Full size hair spray x 2 will fit on the side pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Barrineau

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, but very large.
customer_reviews.text: If for personal use, I think this bag is a quite large. I had to get something to put my makeup in to make it portable, as my 10 year old daughter was constantly getting into my makeup, so I have to keep it out of the bathroom. It has plenty of pockets and everything is easy to find, since it's clear. The pocket cover flaps are still pretty rigid after a month's use, but not too annoying overall. I highly recommend this bag, but wish it came in a slightly smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie Arroz

customer_reviews.title: Glam Squad approved!
customer_reviews.text: Really love this bag. I use this as one of two bags as a nail artist. All of my coworkers who are makeup artists or stylists at glam squad swear by the bag
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Cronin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect as a Diaper Bag lol
customer_reviews.text: This bag is perfect! Since I decided to use the one I bought as a diaper bag I decided to order another one
customer_reviews.author: marieawill2

customer_reviews.title: Shany Clear Large Cosmetic Bag
customer_reviews.text: I received this bag today and I love it. It holds all of my stuff (that used to be distributed into 3 bags) and still has plenty of room for more. The outside pockets are large enough to hold a full can of hairspray and I love the pocket specially designed for kleenex or wipes. Finally, I like the fact that unlike my metal makeup case, this one adds virtually no extra weight. The only con, imo, is that I would have liked to have a pocket inside that zipped or a separate small compartment but that's not a huge deal.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney L. Withers

customer_reviews.title: Love that it’s see through!
customer_reviews.text: I got this to put all my travel makeup for clients and what I use. I love that I see everything at a glance. And it is actually durable material!
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: This bag is awesome! It's huge and can fit so much in ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag is awesome! It's huge and can fit so much in it! I love the tissue box pocket and the pockets on each side. It has strong handles and is really well made. I work on video shoots and needed a kit bag for all the things I could possibly ever need on set. Everything fits. Even my iron! I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Keeley

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: This thing is way more durable than any I have bought
customer_reviews.author: christian vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Good for keeping organized on your counter or when you travel.
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought the bag was a little too big as I was looking for a bag to use when I travel for a few days, but then I realized I can put my make-up bag inside, and have everything in one big bag.
customer_reviews.author: Gutsy Living/Sonia Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and Chique!
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with this bag. I am using it as my own personal MU kit! The quality is good, the compartments are convenient and the inside is easily organizable for other items. The strap and handle are sturdy. But my favorite part is the side compartment built for wipes or facial tissue! Good job Shany!
customer_reviews.author: ButtaflyPoet

customer_reviews.title: Winner
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my mom, she's a hairstylist. She has to have a clear bag when going to work. She says she loves it; gives her a ton of space for all her equipment and products.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Hyland

customer_reviews.title: I do like that it is clear and you can see where ...
customer_reviews.text: I am sure this bag works will for many others but I didn’t realize the bottom was not solid or flat. If you put a lot of heavy items they all fall into the middle of the bag. I do like that it is clear and you can see where everything is.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: It was an xmas gift to our daughter.
customer_reviews.text: She was thrilled. She’s a “girly lady” (as opposed to girly girl) who travels a lot and this provides her with ample room, and is see through so she doesn’t have to guess what she’s brought or forgot.
customer_reviews.author: spygate

customer_reviews.title: I am using this wonderfully large bag to store my grand daughters (age 2 ...
customer_reviews.text: I am using this wonderfully large bag to store my grand daughters (age 2 and 4) large array of small dolls. They see them and can carry them . The product is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Kepic

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made.
customer_reviews.text: Do not even consider this bag. Very stiff and when I opened package some of the snaps that are to be used to close the compartments fell off. Will still use it until I can find something else. as I needed it immediately for a trip, but would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice, durable bag. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice quality bag. I don’t have any issues with any parts of it. I use it to carry my jewelry. I’ve scraped it on walls as I’m walking past(several times) and it has not busted. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Tynesia Davis

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! I’m a makeup artist and this bag holds ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I’m a makeup artist and this bag holds a lot of products! Great quality and love the pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Roxana O.

customer_reviews.title: Good luck stretching the wrinkles out!
customer_reviews.text: Mine arrived with 2 snap covers missing. After using for more than a month, I still can't make it keep its shape. The transparency is convenient, but the wrinkled hard plastic pockets are not. I could fit so much more in this if it actually unfolded like the pic.
customer_reviews.author: Online-aholic

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, lots of pockets
customer_reviews.text: I love the bag but I’m biased on my old one. Only thing I don’t like is the sides do not zip down very far so I can cram more crap in it.
customer_reviews.author: Ann-Marie

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, well organized bag
customer_reviews.text: Loved all the outside pockets, the short handles and the shoulder strap. Easy to find what you need. Just a little heavy even empty but not so much to keep me from buying it again. Holds tons of makeup in a very organized way. Great idea with the two end pockets being taller... For combs, brushes and tall bottles, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in this product
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this product. The bag is so stiff, I had to ask my husband to open it up enough to put my stuff in it. The side pocket (on just one side) adds unnecessary bulk to the item. Finally, the vinyl has a very strong odor. Can't use this bag - will try to return it.
customer_reviews.author: christine b

customer_reviews.title: Its very hard plastic and want get it shape, ...
customer_reviews.text: Its very hard plastic and want get it shape, but I came up with an idea and softened it with my blow dryer in side for a couple mins. Alot bigger than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: CovesBostons

customer_reviews.title: Best bag !!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our Disney trip always a quick search at the gate... Great quality!!!
customer_reviews.author: Laine29

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bag for the professional Makeup Artist
customer_reviews.text: I’m a professional Makeup Artist and this bag is perfect for being on set and getting to yourproducts quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect...
customer_reviews.text: Good...Sort of... I would have given this bag 5 stars except the very first time I used it (this week) a tiny piece broke. That piece is what keeps the large strap attached. Pretty annoyed about it because I appreciate night this one knowing the quality was better than others online. Other then that... It's a great bag!
customer_reviews.author: Scalora SFX

customer_reviews.title: Great Way to Organize Yourself!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect MUA Bag. This transports all the non-makeup items I take to a Gig. Clear, so you can see where everything is, bunches of outside pouches, nice magnets to fasten the pouches. One of MY BEST 2018 purchases as an MUA!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Edwards

customer_reviews.title: I love this.
customer_reviews.text: I love this..I can see all my makeup in the different compartments..so good for travel but it's useful if you don't as well. love it!
customer_reviews.author: Anna B.

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves this bag
customer_reviews.text: My wife love this bag, and at a fraction of the price of most cosmetic bags. The quality is good. The only drawback she sees is obviously others can see right through in case you have some unmentionables in the bag. But these days, who cares anyway?
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: which was easy! but the product itself was NOT a good ...
customer_reviews.text: had rip in bag needed to return, which was easy! but the product itself was NOT a good products for a makeup bag, very stiff plastic it was hard to put product into because product doesnt give at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I am a cosmetologist and I must bring my tools back-and-forth to my work. This bag is perfect it has the perfect size compartments, it is sturdy and lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: D. Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a beautician and I carry around a lot of stuff. This bag allows me to carry my things neatly and since it’s clear I can see where everything is. The size and space amazing. Exactly like the picture
customer_reviews.author: G-rose

customer_reviews.title: gotta get organized?
customer_reviews.text: We are taking a long road trip and I felt like I wouldn't know where my "stuff" was in our van...got this and already I feel the peace of mind...I see everything and it is easily accessible. Grab it and go into hotel/motel situation knowing what I need is at my fingertips....so far, so good
customer_reviews.author: connie peebles

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is the exact size and quality I needed. It fits all my travel toiletries perfectly. I added a bow from my old cosmetic bag to the zipper. Love it!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It will Do
customer_reviews.text: It does hold a lot of makeup, but the plastic is a little hard. Has nice compartments for various stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Strap broke almost immediately!
customer_reviews.text: The strap on the bag broke the second day I had it and the wasn’t even anything in it. I’m in makeup school and I took it there to put my kit in it that we were receiving and on my way there it snapped.
customer_reviews.author: Faith Savannah

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: I love how this bag can hold so many things and that its see through!
customer_reviews.author: Scarlet

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value, it's my favorite set bag.
customer_reviews.text: Well made, cleans easily, has seven exterior pockets, two interior pockets and most importantly...I can easily see where everything is. It's been my favorite set bag ever.
customer_reviews.author: Be Be

customer_reviews.title: Lots of great compartments. Love magnetic snaps on front and think ...
customer_reviews.text: Very durable. Lots of great compartments. Love magnetic snaps on front and think they will be less likely to wear poorly. Nice leather handles for hand carry straps.
customer_reviews.author: LovedByYates

customer_reviews.title: Best Make Up Bag ever
customer_reviews.text: this bag make my life so much easier i love it and can hold a lot of stuff
customer_reviews.author: Judelyne Bataille

customer_reviews.title: Just received my bag today and I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Just received my bag today and I love it!!! I didn't buy this for a makeup bag, but for my hygiene products to fit into for when I travel. It has a lot of pockets that I know will come in handy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really like this bag
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bag, will be using it to take camping with me, is large enough to hold all my makeup and toiletries.

customer_reviews.title: Much smaller then it seems to be
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would be a lot heavier and studdy for carrying my makeup but it seems like it will rip writte away.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag, fits all my traveling needs for cosmetics and toiletries. Roomy and well made quality materials.

customer_reviews.title: ... make up school and have put this bag into great use! holds up all my pallets
customer_reviews.text: I am in my last week of make up school and have put this bag into great use! holds up all my pallets, brushes, and so much other stuff! i love how convenient it is
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Gudino-Bravo

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a hair and makeup artist and I use this for some of my tools. I love that it is clear because it makes it easy to find what you're looking for

customer_reviews.title: I love the bag
customer_reviews.text: I love the bag. I would have rated it 5 stars, however, the shoulder strap was broken when I received it.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and quantity of compartments but it needs more tall compartments.

customer_reviews.text: Great case for storing your makeup as well as using it when you travel!!

customer_reviews.title: If you are looking for a clear makeup bag this ...
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a clear makeup bag this is it. This is made out of thick heavy gauge plastic and it is definitely durable. This one will last.

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend this company
customer_reviews.text: The size of the bag was much smaller than stated on Amazon. Would not recommend this company.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was given as a gift and recipient was very pleased.

customer_reviews.title: Nice design, magnet closure not as strong as I would like.
customer_reviews.text: Nice design, although the magnets don't hold as well if the pockets are full, but is very sturdy.

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome carry-all. Well made, sturdy but flexible. Roomy!!! Would buy again!

customer_reviews.title: Big. Bag
customer_reviews.text: Extra large and easily holds all my cosmetics, hair dryer, hair products and other personal items keeping them organized in one place for my travel trailer.

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag

customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected. Will work great for my makeup kit storage. Separate compartments help keep my things organized.

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love the bag and it was delivered in a really ...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the bag and it was delivered in a really timely manner. The material is sturdy and there are lots of pockets to put each of my tools in to access in a quick manner. It even seems bigger than the picture. My only dissatisfaction is that one of the pocket closers was sewn on backwards so I can not close one of the side pockets. A bit bummed. I would send the bag back but, I must use it for work now. I assume it was just a bad factory run and not intentional. There should have been better checks at the headquarters especially for a bag at this cost.
customer_reviews.author: James Harris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag love it . I put all my makeup is in one place, thank you

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Bag was bought for a beginning stylist to get organized. Worked beautifully!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley hodges

customer_reviews.title: MUA Dream..... better than a dull black bag.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS BAG... I could have bought a pricey bag cause yes us MUA love our stuff. But I love that I can see quickly where everything is.. organize the deep/large side pockets... tissue holder and work faster and more efficient. the handle is really nice and I was able to buy clear pliable pouches so it looks like a set... people give me compliments on it all the time... Also it being clear means when you are looking for something you are not staring into a dark hole... love it.. love it love it..
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Finally! A bag I love!!!
customer_reviews.text: Took me so long to find a bag that was efficient and that I actually liked. As a professional makeup artist, organization is key. And this bag certainly delivers! I love the simplicity and the fact that you can see where everything is. It's also very easy to clean and to keep looking like nice. With any cloth or even leather bags I've had in the past, they start to look ugly as soon as any makeup residue or liquid accidentally even touch it. This one is perfect. I love it! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Glamazon

customer_reviews.title: I like it but-----
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bag, made of nice heavy plastic, no plastic smell, nice pockets with good snaps, roomy, came really fast but---- it was mailed in a too small priority mail box it has major creases and folds because of it. I'm working on getting them out since I like the bag so much- hard to due since the plastic is so thick, but I think it will be worth the effort. Hope I can fix it to look good, if not, guess I'll just use it wrinkled.
customer_reviews.author: a2zmomma

customer_reviews.title: Capacious!
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it's amazingly roomy for all my hair supplies, including even my two sets of large rollers, brushes, combs, triangle net, clips, mousse, styling and finishing sprays, styling creme, root lifter, and shampoo. And I think there would still be room for my hair dryer if I wanted. It's nice to have everything in one place and be able to see where each thing is, because the bag itself is clear. The plastic of this case is thick enough to be strong, durable, and stand up on it's own even when empty. and yet it's flexible, too. I am so glad I ordered it!
customer_reviews.author: Hallie Davis

product_meta.title: SHANY Clear Makeup Bag, Pro Mua rectangular Bag with Shoulder Strap, Large (BLACK)
product_meta.description: Style:Round Bag| Size:LargeThis bag is designed to carry all that the professional makeup artist and hair stylist tools while on the set. This bag is a clear design for fast and easy accessibility. Convenient flip top pockets, spacious compartment and tissue box pocket make all the tools and accessories readily available. Adjustable shoulder strap is included. It’s also great for makeup enthusiasts and personal use to organize your cosmetics, Clear design allow users to see the content easily. Bag has multiple external pockets, and spacious center compartment to organize all essential tools and accessories. We recommend hand washing the bag for best results.
feature_bullets: Durable 100% recycled dry Vinyl with solid construction for durability and long lasting use
The Main bag measures 18" x 10" x 11" - Tissue Box , Multiple External pockets , Side Pockets
Shoulder strap for easy carrying, 100% washable materials, Exterior pockets and zips
It fits all large cosmetics accessories like blow dryers, flat irons, hair dryers, and makeup brushes
Use it as a travel cosmetics bag, makeup organizer, makeup artists travel bag , or a makeup bag
